post.author: 백재진
post.content:
www.redbooks.ibm.com ... search Websphere Version 5 Appication Development handbook...
then go to the deployment (chapter17) and look up ANT part
You will found how to use ant and wsadmin script..
I hope that would be what u are looking for..Scott
This is for WAS 5 version... there must be somewhere like this for was 4 in redbooks
Good luck
PS: If this is useful, I wish this could be next seminar subject..Scott
post.title: ANT and WAS5/ 4
